topic.title: LAK SFR CNC: Specify Lake Transport Observations

para.text: LAK SFR CNC: Specify Lake Transport Observations
Edit each Lake in the Object Properties dialog box. For Lake1, specify Lake transport observations of concentration, from MVR, and to MVR. For Lake2, only specify lake transport concentration.

image.title: Screen capture of the Object Properties dialog box illustrating the specification of lake transport observations.
image.caption: Screen capture of the Object Properties dialog box illustrating the specification of lake transport observations.
